prompt: make a toy for this image, is a android, semihuman called zero for the videogames series megaman

structured_prompt.short_description: A highly detailed collectible toy of Zero from the Mega Man video game series, captured in a dynamic pose as if mid-action. The toy stands on a stylized base resembling a rocky, battle-scarred terrain, with a defeated enemy robot partially visible. The background suggests a dramatic, expansive sky, enhancing the heroic feel of the figure.

objects.description: A meticulously crafted action figure of Zero, an android character from the Mega Man series. He is predominantly red, black, and white with gold accents, featuring a sleek, armored design. His long, flowing blonde hair-like energy strands are prominent.
objects.relationship: main subject, standing triumphantly over a defeated enemy
objects.shape_and_color: anthropomorphic robot, red, black, white, and gold
objects.texture: smooth, metallic, with some matte sections
objects.appearance_details: Glowing green gem on his forehead, a buster cannon on his right arm, and a detailed, segmented armor design.
objects.pose: Dynamic, right arm extended forward with fingers slightly curled, left leg bent and raised, right leg firmly planted on the base.
objects.expression: Determined, implied by the forward-leaning posture and focused gaze through the visor.
objects.action: Posing heroically, as if having just completed an attack or preparing for one.
objects.orientation: Facing slightly to the right, body angled towards the viewer.

objects.description: A stylized base for the action figure, designed to look like rugged, rocky terrain with battle damage. It is textured and uneven, providing a stable platform for the dynamic pose.
objects.relationship: supports the main Zero figure and incorporates the defeated enemy
objects.appearance_details: Cracks and debris suggesting a recent battle.

objects.description: Part of a defeated enemy robot, likely a 'Maverick' from the Mega Man series, lying partially obscured on the base. It is blue and white with red accents, showing signs of damage.
objects.relationship: defeated by Zero, contributing to the heroic narrative
objects.shape_and_color: fragmented robot parts, blue, white, and red
objects.appearance_details: One large red eye-like component is visible, along with a blue arm section.
objects.orientation: Lying on its side, partially broken.

lighting.direction: Backlit and side-lit from the right, creating strong highlights on Zero's armor.
lighting.shadows: Defined shadows on the left side of Zero and beneath the figure, adding depth and contrast.

aesthetics.composition: Dynamic, low-angle shot emphasizing Zero's power and dominance. The figure is slightly off-center, following the rule of thirds.

photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on the Zero action figure.

structured_prompt.context: This is a product photograph of a high-quality collectible action figure, intended for promotional materials, packaging, or display on a collector's website. It aims to showcase the figure's detail and dynamic pose.
